Two. . .thr-" "Wait, samantha" Alex yelled up to his gargantuan sibling. "Yeah lil bro?" She said, uncovering her eyes and looking down at him. "How long do I need to hide for before I win?" He asked. He didn't honestly plan on sticking to the rules, but if escape wasn't possible, he did need a plan b. "Oh. . .good question. I guess uhhh. . . 10 minutes?" She offered. "Ok" he agreed. Alex took off running for the space below her dresser as she covered her eyes and resumed her count.


Alex just reached the sanctuary of the dresser as she finished her count. "Ready or not, here I come little bro!" She called out. He moved to the corner of the dresser and peeked around the corner. His sister's back was turned to him, and he noted her sizable butt apprehensively as she moved around the room. "Hmm." She said as she stroked her chin "are you under. . . HERE?!" She exclaimed as she snatched a pile of clothes off the floor. "Huh" she sighed, a little disappointed.

Alex decided to keep moving. His plan was to sneak to the door and escape if he could. As Samantha had her back turned, her butt in the air, searching under her bed, he made a run for her book shelf. Moving counter clockwise around her room. "Where aarreee you?" She called as her arm searched blindly under the bed. Alex dove behind a stack of books just as Samantha lifted her head and turned in his direction, a look of frustration on her face.

"Come out come out wherever you are." Samantha sang as she stood up and looked around the room. Alex felt the floor shake as his giant sister walked over to her computer desk. Their mother always yelled at Samantha for the way she stomped heavily around the house, and he was feeling it now. She knelt down in front of the desk, checking beneath it and inside the lower drawers. Alex saw his opening and made a run for his sister's clothes hamper. It loomed in the distance like a 20 story building.


He slid behind the hamper. By this time, he was out of breathe. He looked to his right. 200 yards away stood the titanic door. If he could just make it there, he was praying that he was small enough to slip under the door and make his escape to get help. Alex's attention was drawn back to his giantess sister as she finished checking her desk. She rose to full height and moved to the center of her room.

"Uuggh!" She huffed. Only 6 minutes had passed but already she was frustrated that her brother was able to elude her for this long. She stood in the middle of the room with her hands on her hips and scanned the perimeter for movement. "Alex!?" She called. He knew better than to respond. "Alex, this game is stupid. I don't want to play anymore." She whined. "If you come out. . . I promise I'll be niiicccee to you!" She sang innocently. No response.

"Aaallleeexxxx!" She whined again, this time more obnoxiously. Alex wasn't about to fall for her tricks. He remained hidden behind her hamper, waiting to make his move. ". . .fine!. . . Don't come out then! It just means when I find you, you're really going to get it!" No response "I'm gonna. . . I'm gonna. .st- stuff you back in my butt and squash you and sit on you until you cry Alex!" Still he did not respond.

Samantha stomped her foot in anger. Her bratty nature on full display. The force of her stomp caused a lone book to fall off of her shell. It immediately caught her attention and she moved to investigate. Alex was frozen in place as the floor shook beneath her heavy footfalls. He peeked around the corner of the hamper. He could only see his sister's massive pudgy feet, complete with blue polish, planted in front of the book shelf. By this time 8 minutes had passed. Alex considered just waiting out the time, but he wasn't so sure his "little" sister would honor their agreement in her current mood.

The floor quaked beneath his feet as his titanic hundreds dropped to her knees to search the bookshelf. She was a mere 50 yards away from his perspective and all she would need to do is turn her head and he would be discovered. The tension mounted. . .if he was going to make his escape. . .it was now or never!
112131211112222.title: She takes him to her bedroom and immediately st...

1121312111122221.content:
Alex decided it was time to make his move. He would rather make an attempt and go down fighting, than be caught hiding and tortured or winning, only to have Samantha go back on her word and punish him anyway.

He waited for the opportune moment, when her head was turned and her line of sight was blocked by a small stack of books she had created. He took a deep breath and began to Sprint the 200 yards towards the base of the door. He prayed his sister would continue to search the bookshelf long enough for him to slip out of the room.

"Uuggh!" She sighed, exasperated. "You just wait Alex!" She said, more to herself than to her brother. " I'm going to squeeze you so tight in there, your eyes are going to bug out!" She giggled at the thought. By this time, Alex was winded, but at the 100 yard mark. Halfway there. He looked back over his shoulder and to his dismay, his sister was standing back up. She stood over the bookshelf, her hands on her wide hips.

He put his head down and continued for another 30 yards, his pace had slowed to a steady jog now. He cursed his poor cardio. He decided to check her position again. His heart skipped a beat as he watched her head turn in his direction. His movement immediately caught her eye.

"AHA! " she exclaimed happily, clapping her hands. " I found you Alex! You lose and I win. " At this point, Alex only had 50 to go to make it to the door. He ignored his sister and continued to run. "Hey! Didn't you hear me! I said I can see you! " she said again, still not catching on to what he was doing.

The ground beneath him shook, signaling the movement of his super-sized sibling as she advanced on his position. At the 10 yard mark Alex slowed. He looked frantically at the base of the door. A feeling of dread fell over him. He hadn't noticed before, but the carpet from the hallway, was thick enough to form a tight seal with the bottom of the door. He thought back and remembered that Samantha always had to push her door firmly the last inch to close it completely. He cursed his stupidity.

By this time, an ominous shadow was cast over him. He turned around slowly to face the giantess. He was met with the sight of her youthful bare feet. His eyes traveled up, up, up her gargantuan body. He craned his neck and still could barely see her face. "That was a pretty crummy hiding spot bro!" She said happily, still not aware that he was trying to run. "Now. . . Come over here and let's talk about my victory." She finished as she waited patiently for her brother to admit his defeat.

He had a choice to make. He could either accept his fate. Resign himself to being kissed, sat on, squeezed and who knows what other forms of affection/torment. OR. He could attempt to shimmy under the door, and PRAY that there was somewhere to hide on the other side in close proximity. He would only have a few seconds before his sister would easily unlock the door and capture him in the hallway.

"Earth to Alex!" Samantha called down to him, snapping him back into reality. "I'm waaaiiitttiinng. Don't be a jerk and just admit that I beat you." She finished, tapping her big foot impatiently. The vibration sent shivers down his spine. Alex stood motionless for a moment. . . . Then decided to BOLT. He turned and quickly dropped to his knees at the edge of the door. He put his hands on the thick carpet and began to push his way through. It offered less resistance than he had expected, but he still wasn't sure that he could make it through. He pressed on slowly.

"H-hey what are you doing!" Samantha stammered. She watched her tiny brother start to disappear under the door. It took her a moment, but finally Alex's escape plan clicked on her head. She was furious. "Oh no you dont!" She yelled as she dropped to her knees. Alex heard and felt a thunderous boom as his giant sibling pursued him. He HAD to make it. .

Alex's head had just emerged beyond the threshold of the door when he felt something grab his ankle. He kicked and struggled but was unable to free himself. He clambered and clutched at the carpet but it was no use. He began to get pulled back under the door.

"Gotcha!" Samantha exclaimed as she caught her brothers tiny leg in between her fingers. He tried to resist and scream but to no avail as she dragged him back into her room. His powerlessness was really driven home in this moment, as his sister had caught him with minimal effort.

His stomach lurched as he was brought completely into the room and immediately whisked upward. His heart dropped as he was dangled upside down in front of his little sister's cute face. An annoyed look adorned it. He looked down her expansive frame. She had her left leg bent and her hip pushed out. Her right hand was on her hip as her left contained her tiny brother. Alex knew this pose well, and it never ended well for him. When he had seen it in the past at full size, it usually followed with him, flat on his back. His head sat on, his face squished into his bratty siblings big butt cheeks.


"Well well well, look who decided to CHEAT" Samantha spat down at her brother as she gave him a quick shake. "Sammy....i-I was just-" Alex tried to come up with a lie his gullible sister would believe but he drew a blank. "SHUT UP lil bro! You're only making it worse for yourself." "Please Sammy just give me a chance to Mmmnnnpphgg" Alex's pleas were cut short as his giantess sibling handled him roughly. He was flipped right side up and his struggling arms were corralled into her palm. The fight and the air were squeeze out of him as her "for him" thick fingers coiled around his tiny body like an anaconda. When she finished, only a tuft of hair and a pair of little feet were visible in her tight fist.

Alex groaned and was made to see stars as his sister poured on the pressure. His facial features were rearranged by her index finger and his ribs were resized as she continued to manhandle him. He was brought to the edge of black out before she finally eased her grip, feeling his struggles subside.

She maneuvered him again, this time leaving his head outside her hand this time. A dazed, defeated look on his face. He was brought close to her lips as she addressed him. "Well little brother, I THOUGHT we had a good thing going. All you had to do was hide for 10 minutes and we could have done whatever you wanted. But you couldn't do it could you!" She said narrowing her eyes. " You KNEW I would beat you so you decided to CHEAT, huh Alex?" Alex was still too dazed to answer. His head slumped on her big finger. "That's what I thought!" She continued. " And it's juuusst fine. It just means I get to show you what happens to cheaters." As she said this she brought him down and around her waist, presenting him with a view of her ass. Alex flinched as he was brought into the presence of her gargantuan buns.

"That's right Alex. You get the butt. Only you don't get to kiss it and love it like I might have let you if you had followed the rules. No. You're going under it. " she purposely shook her cheeks to scare him as she let her words sink in. "Well, ready or not, here we go!" She giggled evil as she walked over to her bed. Alex could do nothing from inside her hand as she lowered him down to her bedspread close to the wall. She pinned him down easily with her fingers as she crawled up on her bed with him. "Now. . . Hold still while I get ready" she said as she rotated her body so that her butt as above him and she was propped on her free hand and both feet. Alex looked up. High above him, his sister's huge ass. Like a giant boulder just waiting to crush him. At this point, there was no difference between the two.

Samantha made her buns jiggle as she lowered herself down on to her brother. Alex closed his eyes and cringed as he waited for the inevitable. As her ass approached, she removed her hand from him. They both knew it was too late for him to escape. Just when Alex expected her to touch down, he felt nothing. He cautiously opened one eye and looked up. Her colossal bottom still hovered above him, although it has stopped its descent. Alex sighed a breath of relief, but as if on cue, Samantha dropped the rest of the way on to his tiny frame.

"Ugghh" was all Alex managed to say as he was piledriven into the mattress. He felt like he was drowning as he was pushed deeper and deeper by her comparatively massive weight. Samantha laughed hard at the joke she had pulled. She reached down, lifting a butt cheek, and spoke to her squashed brother. "Hahaha, did you really think I wasn't going to sit on you Alex? Not a chance, you little jerk!" She finished, releasing her cheek, letting it flop back down and snuff out the light on her brother. From there, she shook and gyrated her hips, squashing and squeezing him down. When she had him where she wanted. Squished up between her dominating glutes, she pulled her legs in to sit cross-legged, leaned back against the wall, and began playing on her phone. Ignoring him.
1121312111122221.title: He makes a hasty escape attempt

choices: Hours later, Samantha returns ready for more games
Someone else finds him in the drawer
11213121111222211.content:
Alex was trapped in a tomb of his siblings flesh. Every minute or two she would lift a cheek to keep him from passing out but other than that she gave him no attention. He was stuck. Alone in the darkness and the pressure below her butt. These were the terms of his punishment for cheating during their game and it would continue for the next 2 hours.

Finally Samantha decided to get up. Alex was left laying in the sunken, sweaty crater left from her big butt. She didn't bother to grab him. There was no need. His tiny body was too cooked and over-heated for him to even think about moving. He just lay there motionless and panting. His whole body was red from the heat and pressure.

Samantha spoke to him as she changed out of her sweaty shorts and into some old leggings. "That's what you get for cheating Alex." "Shut up Samantha" Alex responded before he had the chance to think about what he was saying. "What did you say?" She asked slightly annoyed as she walked back to the edge of her bed. "Nothing, I'm just saying" "That's right nothing" she replied. "You know what your problem is?" She continued as she walked over to her mirror and began to brush her hair casually. Alex wisely kept his mouth shut. "Like you never know when to just shut up and stay down. You know? Like, it could have been waaayy worse for you. I mean....i only sat on you for like, 2 hours maybe. Plus. . . I could have bounced on you or farted on you or whatever. So just stop crying and lay there." Alex heeded her advice, but he swore to himself, if he ever got back to his regular side, he would make that little bitch pay.

Samantha rummaged through her dresser, then walked over to her bed. Alex lifted his head enough to see that she was holding one of her old soccer socks. "Alright little brother, I'm going to hang out with my friends now, so it's time to put you away. " Alex fumed at the way she said "put you away" like he was some type of little toy to her, but at this point it was hard to tell if he wasn't. He had just spent 2 hours as her seat cushion on a whim.

He flinched as her giant hand came into view and scooped him out of the indent her butt had left. The cool touch of her skin felt good on his heated body, but the relief was short-lived as he was unceremoniously dumped into the mouth of the sock. Alex rolled down the tube and came to an abrupt stop in the toe. Laying in the dark, he could hear motion above him, but couldn't tell what was happening. Outside the sock, his sister had tied the tube of the sock in to a tight knot. Completely eliminating his chance of escape.

"Have fun in there buddy!" Samantha taunted as she carried him back over to her dresser drawer. "I'll see you later tonight so we can play more games." With that, she lowered him into the drawer and buried him under the other socks for save keeping. She closed the drawer and that was the last he saw of her.

In the darkness, buried in socks, Alex began to plot. Some way some how he would escape. He would have his revenge.
11213121111222211.title: Continue.

112131211112222111.content:
Left alone in the confines of his cotton prison, Alex had nothing but time to contemplate his revenge plan. Time passed slowly from inside his sister's sock drawer and he wasn't sure if mere minutes ha passed since she locked him away or hours. Be that as it may, a viable course of action materialized and he began to put it into motion.

Some time later, Alex had dozed off when he was startled awake by the tell-tale signs of a giantess approaching. The artificial wooden ground beneath him shook as the heavy stomping of who he could only guess was Samantha, entered the bedroom.

Alex struggled to listen, as his world was muffled by tons of socks, but he swore he heard at least two voices in the room now. His heart beat quickened as all he could do was wait for the inevitable. Though his plan had begun, he knew that he would still have to endure more torments and humiliation before it could come to fruition. The important thing, was that he didn't allow his spirit and will to resist to be crushed or smothered along with his body.

What felt like an eternity, but was really only 15 minutes later, he was startled as the drawer around him began to move. It was pulled out, and he could feel some of the sock weight being lifting. His stomach dropped as finally he felt himself being removed from the dresser. After the feeling of weightlessness, he was once again placed on some type of surface. This time it cradled him, and he assumed he was now resting in someone's palm.

The cotton ceiling above him came to life as a giant hand fiddled with the knot. Alex screwed his eyes shut when light suddenly flooded in from above. Once they had adjusted, he looked up to see the giant faces of two girls. One was Samantha. The other was that a girl that looked to be her same age. He thought he recognized her but he couldn't place a name with the face. Samantha always had random friends at the house anyway.

Both girls were grinning from ear to ear. "Awww he's so cute!" The mystery friend squealed. "I know right!" Samantha replied "I'm so happy he chose me instead of my mom." "Let's get him out and play with him, I can't wait anymore!" Her friend said excitedly. His world was flipped as Samantha tipped the sock upside down. He tumbled down the tube and came to an abrupt stop in her waiting palm. Her fingers immediately closed around him possessively.

Trapped by her fingers, he was bounced around as Samantha skipped over to her bed. She sat down on one end, and her friend sat on the other facing her. They both had their legs outstretched and he was deposited in between them. Alex struggled to stand on the cushy surface of the bed as he looked up at his gargantuan sister defiantly. Being back in this place, reminded him of the squashing he had taken not hours before.

"Ok Alex, me you and Brittany are going to play a fun little game." Samantha began. "Brittany......brittany" Alex thought. Why did that name sound so familiar. He zoned back in, apparently in the middle of her explaining rules to the game. "And if you can avoid being pinned, you win. But if you can't, you have to be our little servant for the rest of the night. Oh yeah, by the way. Brittany got permission to spend the night so we have plenty of time to redeem yourself if you lose." She finished. A cocky smirk on her face.

Anger flashed in his eyes as he watched his sister smugly above him. Alex struggled to hold his tongue, but for his plan to work, he had to pick the correct times to rebel. Caught in between two giantesses, a wall, and a 50 foot drop was not the ideal situation. "Ok Samantha" he replied somewhat timidly. "Alright, let's get started! I've been waiting for this ever since Sammy to me you caught the shrinking disease." Brittany said happily. Behind him, the giant blond girl began to stack pillows and stuffed animals around her as Samantha did the same. When they finished, they had effectively created a colosseum, with which Alex was currently trapped in along with two young, giant girls.

Alex noticed that both girls had brought their feet in closer. Samantha's shorter more stubby toes to his right, and Brittany's longer more slender ones to his left. Not sure if what was going on, Alex cursed himself for not paying attention to the rules of the game.

"You ready britt?" Samantha asked her partner in crime sitting across from her. "Oh yeah!" Let's get em'!" She replied. Psyching herself up. "Ok I'm starting the timerrrr. .now" Samantha said as she pushed something on her phone. "5 minutes Alex" she said, setting her phone aside and focusing on the little being between their legs.

"5 minutes" Alex thought. "It must be a survival game." He was able to think no more as he saw something approach from the corner of his eye. He just managed to dodge as Brittany's foot came down where he was just standing. "Dang, he is a quick one" she said pulling her foot back. Alex didn't time to rest, as now samantha's left foot closed the distance. Again he tried to dodge, but he tripped on a fold in her bedspread. He could only attempt to shield his face with his arms as her big foot descended on him. The air was squeezed out of him as her foot pushed past his puny arms and settled heavily on his chest and head.

"Gotcha!" Samantha exclaimed as she moved her face in closer to see what she was doing. "Do you give up Alex?" She asked as she just rested her foot on him. He didn't reply as he struggled for release. "I take that as a no, Sammy" Brittany replied. "I think you need to show him whose in charge here" she finished. A smirk forming on her face. "I think you're right" with that, Samantha carefully slid her foot back so that her toes were above his head, and the rest of her foot covered his body. When she was satisfied, she slowly began to increase the pressure on his body while simultaneously drumming her toes playfully on his face.

Alex strained under the weight of his little sister's foot but found it hard to focus with his face getting pummeled by toes. He gradually lost the war as she increased the pressure to the point where he could no longer move and breathing became laboured, and there she held him. "I don't feel him squirming under there anymore" Samantha said to her friend. They both watched him intently as his face began to turn red. "Remeber bro, all you have to do is say you submit and I'll let you go. You don't want to pass out do you.?" She asked down to him, lifting her toes so he could speak. "Yeah but if he does pass out, it still counts as a win for us." Brittany chimmed in with a bratty tone. "And the timer stops until he wakes up too" Alex wasn't sure if she was just making up rules as she went, but he was currently not in any position to argue.

With only seconds before black out, Alex gave in and wheezed his submission. Samantha lifted her foot from his body but kept it hovering in close proximity. "What was that lil bro?" She asked, barely concealing her smile. "I submit Samantha, you beat me." "Ok round one goes to us!" She said happily as she grabbed her phone and stopped the timer. "Not bad, you managed to last 36 seconds alex" she said as she pulled her legs into her chest and had her soles flat on the bed. "Now for the reward!"

Alex who had since climbed back to his feet, took an involuntary step back. " Oh no you don't, we had a deal" Brittany said from above. He was shoved roughly from behind and stumbled in front of his sister's massive feet. "10 GOOD kisses on each foot loser!" Alex searched samantha's face for any type of mercy but found nothing but her victorious grin. "Hurry up! We don't have all day you little brat. . . Or do I need to MAKE you do it?" Brittany finished, alternating effortlessly between bratty and bitchy.

He had no time to respond as suddenly he felt giant fingers coiling around his body. Brittany snatched him from the bed spread and brought him to her face. "Now the fun starts, get to work!" She said coldly as she lowered him back down to his sister's waiting feet. Her toes wiggling in anticipation.

Brittany gripped Alex's head firmly between her thumb and index finger. With no further words, his face was roughly smashed into the crevice between the second and third toes on her right foot. "One" the girls counted in unison. His face was reposition and once again smashed into a doughy crevice. This continued for a 20 count before Alex was deposited back into the middle ground between his two giant bullys.
112131211112222111.title: Samantha returns. . . With a friend.

1121312111122221111.content:
Alex climbed to his feet and brushed some toe jam from his face. The humiliation only strengthened his resolve. He was determined to beat these girls at their own game.

"Are you ready to start Alex?" Samantha asked, picking up her phone, ready to hit the stop watch. "Yeah, let's do this." He said, plotting the escape route ahead of him. "Ok. Three. . Two. .one. . Go" she said pressing the button.

Alex immediately bolted to his left, narrowly dodging brittany's left foot as she tried to stomp him right out of the gate. He sprinted across the soft surface of the bed, careful not to trip on the wavey bed spread. He ducked his head, avoiding samantha's right foot as she tried for an attack of her own. A brutal clothesline. As he moved forward, he hurdled another attempt from Brittany as she placed her foot in front of him to block his way. Immediately samantha's right foot came back into view, causing Alex to dodge back to his left.

His confidence began to rise as he had already taken 40 seconds off the clock. In the back of his mind, the possibility of victory blossomed. The feeling was short lived. In the blink of an eye, he was blind sided by an unseen foot. He tumbled forward and came to a rest several prospective yards away on his stomach. Alex instantly went to push himself up, but was met with the sole a foot at squashed him down into the mattress.

'Yes! Got em'" Brittany cried cheerfully, twisting her foot on Alex's back. Below, Alex tried to struggle but to no avail. His cries were muffled into the mattress as the foot ground him down. There was a moment of peace, before it repositioned itself, toes now over his shoulders. He tried to fight them off as they snaked down around his neck and head. They closed in, effectively gripping him like the safety restraints of roller coaster. His neck being squeezed tightly between her big and second toes. His stomach dropped as he was accelerated upward and into the air.

Above him, Brittany leaned back and crossed her legs at the knee. She casually bobbed and dangled the tiny prisoner between her toes above the bed with her ankle. Between said toes, Alex fought to breathe as she effortlessly strangled him. His face turned a deep red. Partially from being strangled, partially from humiliation.

Samantha moved closer to get a better view. She showed no signs of pity as she observed her brother being handled roughly. "Oh man, you've got him so good! Why didnt i think of that?" She commented as she looked on. "I know right. There is like nothing he can do about it either" Brittany replied nonchalantly.

Meanwhile between her toes, Alex was still fighting to breathe. He planned to hold out as long as he could. Keeping in mind that the clock was still counting down. After another 15 seconds, he began to frantically tap on Brittany's toes. "I think he is giving in Britt." Samantha said as she reached for and stopped the clock. "Is that so?" Brittany replied, grabbing her foot and pulling her foot up to her face. "Looks like round 2 goes to us." Alex was moments from passing out now. Brittany looked him directly in the eyes as he slowly suffocated. His desperate taps meant nothing to her. "That being said, I still want to see the little loser go night night!" She finished evily.


In that moment, Alex remembered why Brittany had looked so familiar to him. His memory was fully jogged as he faded away. Squeezed unconscious between the toes of this young girl.






It was 8 or 9 months earlier. Winter was well underway. Alex had gotten home from school before both Megan and Samantha. He had had a long day, so he decided to take a nap on the couch in the living room. In his slumber, Alex never heard Samantha return home.

Alex was woken with a start as he was now laying on the ground. Above him, his sister and her taller blonde friend. "What the hell are you doing samantha" Alex said angrily, rubbing his eyes. "I'm telling mom you said hell" she replied, bratty as ever. "Just go up to your room and leave me alone" he groaned. She always knew exactly what would annoy him at any given point.

"No, I don't have to. " she replied, sticking her tongue out at him. "Fine, whatever. " Alex knew it wasn't worth the effort. Their mom always sided with his sister's when they fought anyway. Ignoring them, he climbed back on the couch and began to watch tv. At that point, they retreated to the kitchen to make themselves something to eat.

About a half hour later, Alex was starting to get into his show when they returned. As they walked passed the tv on their way upstairs, Samantha stopped midway, blocking Alex's view. Still somewhat tired from his day at school, he didn't have the patience to deal with her shot that day. "Samantha, get your fat ass out of the way!" Alex yelled. He immediately regretted it.

Samantha gave him her trademarked "hurt" looked, and he knew she was about to cry. "No, Sammy. . . Look. . . I -I'm sorry ok?" Alex began but it was too late. Tears began to stream down her face. Alex sighed and stood up. He walked over to her and knelt down in front of her. "I'm telling mom you yelled at me!" She sobbed. While Alex really did feel bad about making her cry, the main reason he didn't want her to tell their mother, was that he had a video game tournament that weekend and he didn't want to get grounded.

"Pleeeaaase don't do that sam!" Alex begged, putting his hands together. "I'll do anything, just please don't tell on me." "A-anything?" She asked optimistically between sniffles. "Alex instantly regretted his choice of words. "Yeah anything" he replied. The tournament was worth it to him.

Samantha bowed her head timidly for a moment and wiped her tears, before she brought her face up grinning from ear to ear. "We want to sit on you! She declared loud and clear. "On your face! Until mom gets home from work!" Alex looked over to see that her friend was smiling too. "I can't believe he actually fell for that! She Said giggling like mad. "I told you it would work!" Samantha replied, laughing equally as hard.

"Why you little bi-" Alex began before he was interrupted. "Uh uh uhh. Remember. If you don't agree, I'll call mom. I'll make her come home from work and when she gets here, it will be over for you." Alex knew she was right. He was out of options. He also couldn't believe he fell for her trick.

"That's a good boy," she cooed, patting his head as she spoke. " Now come on. We are going to my room." She said, grabbing him by the shirt and leading him up the stairs with her friend in tow. Inside her room, she wasted no time. Alex was made to lay down in the center of the room. "Ok Alex, me and Brittany are going to take turns sitting on your face while the other one sits on your stomach. If you fight us or struggle, I'm calling mom." She dictated, as much to Brittany as to Alex.


The next hour and a half was a blur as the girls sat all over him. His world became sweat pants and moist socks as they took turn after turn on his face. Sometimes they sat back to back, completely eclipsing him. Other times they both bounced on his chest and stomach, pounding the wind from him.

Finally, after he had taken more than he could handle, his face red from lack of air, he heard the garage door open down stairs.
